DescriptionData.Title: 5" Smiley Balloon - Yellow Only (100/bag)
DescriptionData.Description: Imprinted 5 inch round balloons. Use 'em alone as giveaways or to create unique balloon sculptures. Yellow with a black smiley face. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Yellow with black smiley face print

DescriptionData.Title: 5" Round Balloons - Google Eyes/Octopus (100/bag)
DescriptionData.Description: Imprinted 5 inch round balloons. Use 'em alone as giveaways or to create unique balloon sculptures. Yellow with a black smiley face. Assortment may include: Red, Orange, Yellow, Pink and Pale Blue. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Assortment may include: Red, Orange, Yellow, Pink and Pale Blue

DescriptionData.Title: 6 inch Blossom (Geo) Balloons - Flower Assortment (100/bag)
DescriptionData.Description: Qualatex 6" Blossom (Geo) balloons. Flower Assortment may include: Pink, White, Rose, Spring Lilac, Lime Green. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Flower Assortment may include: Pink, White, Rose, Spring Lilac, Lime Green

DescriptionData.Title: Pin The Nose On The Clown Games
DescriptionData.Description: A new spin on the traditional "Pin the Nose on the Donkey" game. Includes: 18" x 24" Clown Face, Blindfold Mask and 12 Numbered Noses.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pin the nose on the clown game
Includes 18" X 24" clown face, blindfold, and 12 numbered noses

DescriptionData.Title: 11 Inch Round Polka Dot Balloons Assortment, 100/Pack
DescriptionData.Description: Imprinted 11 inch round balloons. Use 'em alone as giveaways or to create unique balloon sculptures. Assortment may include: Orange, Lime Green, Wild Berry, Chocolate Brown and Robin's Egg Blue. 100 per bag.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Assortment may include: Orange, Lime Green, Wild Berry, Chocolate Brown and Robin's Egg Blue

DescriptionData.Title: Qualatex Hand Pumps - Single Action
DescriptionData.Description: This economical single action hand pump is very sturdy and lightweight. It's easiest to use for small hands, plus it has its own storage compartment, which you can fill with twisting balloons.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Good for users with small hands

DescriptionData.Title: Twist-N-Flate Pumps
DescriptionData.Description: The Twist-N-Flate is please to present a portable, battery-powered, high-pressure inflator specifically designed for most all sizes of modeling balloons. It is a great tool for Twisters, Clowns, and Professional Entertainers. It provides years of reliable and long term use. It easily inflates 160's, 260's and 360 sized modeling balloons without pre-stretching. High-powered battery will run about 3 hours, enough to inflate up to 500 balloons. Inflates most all modeling balloons in seconds for maximum performance. "Quick Change" battery compartment allows for easy battery replacement in the field. Battery can be charged during use for extended performance. Can be shouldered mounted for either right or left hand use. Universal nozzle tip is designed to fit most all types and sizes of modeling balloons. Premium quality engineering and materials have been used in the Twist-N-Flate for lasting performance and reliability.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Battery-powered (3 hour charge/approximately 500 balloons) Can be charged during use
Easily inflates 160's, 260's, and 360 model balloons without prestretching, nozzles fits most types and sizes of modeling balloons
Shoulder mounted for left or right hand use
